thread.section_title: Mandarin Oriental, Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: As close to perfection as you can get
thread.title_full: As close to perfection as you can get - Review of Mandarin Oriental, Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jean P
title: As close to perfection as you can get
text: Excellent hotel, nicely located, modern decoration of the room with high end furniture and bathroom. Staff is very professional and tries to meet all of your requests. Breakfast is complete with an excellent cold buffet and warms meals on request.
